meanings.definition: Have the same opinion or be in harmony with someone or something.
meanings.sent1: I agree with my friend on our favorite movie.
meanings.sent2: Let's agree on the best time to meet.
meanings.sent3: The cat and dog seem to agree on taking a nap together.
meanings.sent4: The colors of the painting agree perfectly with the room decor.
meanings.sent5: The team must agree on a strategy to win the game.

meanings.definition: Give consent or approval to something.
meanings.sent1: I agree to lend you my book.
meanings.sent2: She agreed to the terms of the contract.
meanings.sent3: The cookies look so good, I can't help but agree to try one.
meanings.sent4: The sun finally agreed to come out after days of rain.
meanings.sent5: He agreed to help with the project after some convincing.

meanings.definition: Be consistent or compatible with something.
meanings.sent1: The new data agree with the previous findings.
meanings.sent2: His actions don't agree with his words.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces agree perfectly to form a picture.
meanings.sent4: The music and lyrics agree beautifully in this song.
meanings.sent5: The ingredients in the recipe must agree for it to turn out right.
